channel.title: The Massdebating Handbook
channel.description:
These are the rules:
1. [b]'Ask a...' Threads:[/b] If these aren't serious, you'll get an infraction. If the threads descend into petty name-calling and trolling, they're closed and the members responsible get an infraction.
2. [b]Be Civil:[/b] For the most part (apart from the above stipulation) I'm going to try and be as un-moderating on this board as possible. Don't take this as a licence to be an idiot or else you'll be taking a holiday.
3. [b]Serious Threads:[/b] Religion, Politics, Popular Culture et al is fine. But don't make a debate thread for the hell of it.
4. [b]Reporting:[/b] Seeing as though the Massdebating Hall doesn't contribute to your post count, only report posts that are either deliberately derailing the thread or offensive.
5. [b]Re-Opening Threads:[/b] Once a thread is closed, it will no longer be re-opened.
